message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe it would be beneficial for both of us if we could come to an agreement. My initial offer for the product is $950,000.

Alice, your offer is a good starting point, but I'm looking for a price closer to $900,000 to make this deal work for me. I'm confident this product is valuable, but I need to ensure it fits within my budget. Let's see if we can find common ground.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your input and am willing to consider your needs. In light of this, I propose a counteroffer of $925,000 for the product. This is a fair compromise that takes into account both the value of the product to you and my position. I look forward to your consideration.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While I value the product, $925,000 is still a bit higher than what I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $912,500. This shows my commitment to the deal, and I hope it's a figure we can both agree on.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your position and respect your valuation of the product. In order to reach an agreement, I propose a counteroffer of $917,500. This figure represents a compromise that acknowledges your budgetary constraints while still reflecting the value of the product. I hope this proposal will facilitate our transaction.
